snippet.title: Nous | DigiPen Institute of Technology Singapore
snippet.description:
http://Singapore.DigiPen.edu/ | DigiPen Institute of Technology Singapore

Just who are you, anyway? Nous, the computer analysis machine, will tell you. Your responses shape the experience as the game world changes to suit your playstyle. As Nous learns more about you, the challenges grow more intense ... and personal. Fight your demons or embrace your friends. Face your fears or flee in terror. Beat the computer at its own game.

Download the game for free at:
https://www.digipen.edu/?id=1170&proj=24646

DigiPen Institute of Technology offers bachelor's and master's degree programs in computer science, computer engineering, game design, digital art and animation, and music and sound design.
